LanguageData.Frame_FT_Barrier.label: Concrete barrier (building)
LanguageData.Frame_FT_Barrier.description: A solid concrete barrier that can hinder the movement of vehicles and provide cover.
LanguageData.Frame_FT_BarrierDiagonal.label: Diagonal concrete barrier (building)
LanguageData.Frame_FT_BarrierDiagonal.description: A solid concrete barrier that can hinder the movement of vehicles and provide cover.
LanguageData.Frame_FT_Sandbag.label: Military Sandbag (building)
LanguageData.Frame_FT_Sandbag.description: Bags of locally-sourced dirt or sand, stacked for use as cover. More professional-looking than basic sandbags.
LanguageData.Frame_FT_TankTrap.label: Tank trap (building)
LanguageData.Frame_FT_TankTrap.description: A solid concrete pillar meant to hinder the movement of vehicles.
LanguageData.Frame_FT_Tetrapods.label: Tetrapods (building)
LanguageData.Frame_FT_Tetrapods.description: A solid concrete pillar designed to hinder naval landings.
LanguageData.Frame_FT_WallSandbag.label: Military sandbag wall (building)
LanguageData.Frame_FT_WallSandbag.description: Bags of locally-sourced dirt or sand, stacked for use as wall.
